subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Close, who died Sunday at 84, was a leader who never was afraid of getting hit by the ball, and he was the youngest ever to play for England at age 18 in 1949.
snippet: Close, who died Sunday at 84, was a leader who never was afraid of getting hit by the ball, and he was the youngest ever to play for England at age 18 in 1949.
